quote: Your own Self-Realization is the greatest service you can render the world.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: Self consciousness is the ultimate wisdom of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The living self has one purpose only: to come into its own fullness of being.
author: D.H. Lawrence,  Selected Essays

quote: This above all: to thine own self be true.
author: William Shakespeare,  Hamlet

quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: When you believe in yourself sufficiently and are confident that everything that you desire is inside you then you will possess the ability to produce all that you wish for.
author: Stephen Richards,  Be First: Achieve Every Dream

quote: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: It is not in life, but in art that self-fulfillment is to be found.
author: Wilson Mizner

quote: Self-education is the greatest self-liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You are the creation of your own consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I think of myself as a catalyst of action and a messenger of hope, turning people onto themselves and turning people onto their dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: Self education is the key to self liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Self-acceptance is pure power.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Success is realising the true joy and wonder of life can only be yours if you follow your own intuition, aiming to achieve your bliss.
author: Steven Redhead,  The Solution

quote: To exist is to change, to change is to mature, to mature is to go on creating oneself endlessly.
author: Henri Bergson

quote: Once you can let go of illusion and draw upon a more universal source of motivation then you will re connect with your true purpose on Earth.
author: Gary Markwick

quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
author: Plutarch

quote: Accept yourself: flaws, quirks, talents, secret thoughts, all of it, and experience true liberation.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Define yourself radically as one beloved by God. This is the true self. Every other identity is illusion.
author: Brennan Manning,  Abba's Child: The Cry of the Heart for Intimate Belonging

quote: I have an idea of who I want to be, I have a vision of my own success.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: Before man ventures into daydreams about his futuristic society, he shouldfirst immerse himself in the nothingness of his being, and finally restore life to what it is all about: a working hypothesis.
author: Tomislav Sunic

quote: The formula of happiness and success is just, being actually yourself, in the most vivid possible way you can.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: The mind's first step to self-awareness must be through the body.
author: George Sheehan

quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Part of being of a true existentialist is wanting to be what we make ourselves be by the way we choose to act, as opposed to making excuses for the way we act and regretting it.
author: Gary Cox,  How to Be an Existentialist: or How to Get Real, Get a Grip and Stop Making Excuses

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Education is experience, and the essence of experience is self-reliance.
author: T.H. White,  The Once and Future King

quote: Sometimes, being true to yourself means changing your mind. Self changes, and you follow.
author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration

quote: As architect of your reality, you are empowered to create it as you choose.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: We seldom realize, for example that our most private thoughts and emotions are not actually our own. For we think in terms of languages and images which we did not invent, but which were given to us by our society.
author: Alan W. Watts

quote: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: We co-create our reality with others in unseen ways.
author: Doug Dillon

quote: Whenever you think or you believe or you know, you're a lot of other people: but the moment you feel, you're nobody-but-yourself.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Only two kinds of people can attain self-knowledge: those who are not encumbered at all with learning, that is to say, whose minds are not over-crowded with thoughts borrowed from others; and those who, after studying all the scriptures and sciences, have come to realise that they know nothing.
author: Ramakrishna,  Sayings of Sri Ramakrishna

quote: The task of modern man is not to find his inner self, but to create himself.
author: Rod Judkins,  Change Your Mind: 57 Ways to Unlock Your Creative Self

quote: The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free.
author: Deborah Day

quote: I am serving the purpose for which I was designed, therefore I am satisfied with my existence.
author: Kevin J. Anderson

quote: When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: An empowered life begins with serious personal questions about oneself. Those answers bare the seeds of success.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: When you stop existing and you start truly living, each moment of the day comes alive with the wonder and synchronicity.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Circumstances, knowledge or birth do not determine the realisation of your desires. It is only you who are blocking the achievement of your dreams and goals.
author: Stephen Richards,  Think Your way to Success: Let Your Dreams Run Free

quote: First and foremost: a human being. If your definition of yourself is something else; maybe you should reconsider.
author: Berivan Selim

quote: To solve a problem, change your awareness, perception, and consciousness about the problem.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everyone creates realities based on their own personal beliefs. These beliefs are so powerful that they can create [expansive or entrapping] realities over and over.~Kuan Yin
author: Hope Bradford,  Beneficial Law of Attraction: The Manifestation Teachings

quote: Awareness (of the Self) prevails in matters where one becomes attachment-free (vitrag), and where one has attachment-abhorrence, there his awareness will not prevail.
author: Dada Bhagwan

quote: Be true to yourself to reveal your own unique beauties, feelings, and perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: For the wise have always known that no one can make much of his life until self-searching has become a regular habit, until he is able to admit and accept what he finds, and until he patiently and persistently tries to correct what is wrong. – Bill W.
author: Bill W.
